EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up to NetApp Insight: VMTurbo Cluster Mode Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We hope that you found NetApp Insight to be a valuable event. We enjoyed being part of it for the first time this year, having announced our collaboration with NetApp last week whereby VMTurbo will support clustered Data ONTAP 8.2.
For more details on cluster-mode support, check out this short article <http://bit.ly/175diSJ>, which explains how NetApp customers benefit from the following features of cluster mode support:
- Maps end-to-end relationships from VMs to Vservers and associated volumes, aggregates and controllers - Enables controlling (or recommending) movement of volumes across aggregates - Enhances storage efficiency and performance across the clustered deployment
We look forward to staying in touch with you. Please feel free to contact us anytime.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team
